PUFInstance.description: The IP core implements a ring oscillator puf developed by the TIMA laboratory. It consists of 2 blocks of 256 ring oscillators. Through the 8-bit challenge you can select which pair of oscillators to compare (e.g., C=27, you compare oscillator 27 from block 1 with oscillator 27 from block 2). With each query, in addition to the 1-bit response, referring to the comparison, the puf also returns the value of both counters.
